title: Can we increase our cgpa in coming sems from 2nd sem
content: How difficult it would be when we move from 2nd year to 3rd or 4th year to increase our cgpa

comments.body:
2nd sem is fairly easy and most people ( not all NOTE) see an upward of around 0.5 - 0.6 in their sgpa for the same effort put in the previous sem.

3rd sem is horrendous  but most people got better grades than expected .
But I feel 4th sem is relatively easier with a ton of stuff being theory oriented , gotta see now .

About 5th and 6th I'm not eligible to comment .

Don't expect drastic changes in your gpa after 2nd year. If you work hard you can increase it by 0.5-1 by end of 4th year. Personally I had a terrible 1st year so I saw almost 0.7 cgpa increase after 3rd year.
What is your overall cgpa now?
4th sem of pes ya baaki college also apply?

I can't comment about other colleges as I'm not aware about their course contents , however it is a general notion among students and teachers alike that even sems are almost always easier than odd sems
